items.sentence: I lived a couple of blocks away from Tom when we were kids.
I don't know exactly when Tom will be coming to pick me up.
It never occurred to Tom that Mary wouldn't want him there.
It never occurred to me that Tom might not be feeling well.
If there is a suitable occasion, I'll introduce you to Tom.
The weights were so heavy that the barbell started to bend.
How much does this barbell weigh without any weights added?
Is it right for a doctor to decide when someone should die?
I think that it's really important for you to go to Boston.
Tom tried his best not to let people see what he was doing.
